HELP_MSG_ADSHOP:
<font color='#00ff00'>[Ad Shop]</font>
You can watch Ads to obtain items.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Random Ruby Box]</font>
You can watch an Ad to obtain 100 to 1000 Rubies at random.
HELP_MSG_ALTER:
<font color='#00ff00'>[Hero Summon]</font>
You can use Hero Seals to summon Heroes. You can select 1 of 4 Scrolls to summon and better Scroll will have higher probability of summoning a High Class Hero and you'll get more Hero Shards. There's a chance of summoning a complete Hero.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Purchase Hero]</font>
You can use Ancient Coins to purchase Hero Shards. You can obtain Ancient Coins by Dismantling Hero Shards. 

<font color='#00ff00'>[Summon Gear]</font>
You can use Gear Seals to summon Gear. You can select 1 of 4 Chests to summon and better chests will have a higher probability of summoning High Tier Gear and you'll get more Gear. Depending on the progress on the Battlefield, the Chest's Level will increase. This will increase the amount of obtainable Gear Seals and also increase the Tier of Gear.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Dismantle Hero]</font>
You can dismantle Hero Shards to obtain Ancient Coins.

HELP_MSG_ARCHER:
<font color='#00ff00'>[Gear Classification]</font>

Weapon: Bow and arrow. You'll need Enhance Scrolls to enhance weapons, and you'll need Weapon Protection Stones to protect them.
Armor: Helmet, Armor, Gloves, Boots. You'll need Armor Enhance Scrolls to enhance armor and you'll need Armor Protection Stones to protect them.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Gear Effect]</font>

Bow – ATK / Attack Speed
Arrow – ATK / Attack Speed
Helmet – ATK / DEF Penetration
Armor – ATK / ACCURACY
Gloves – ATK / CRIT
Boots – ATK / CRIT DMG

<font color='#00ff00'>[Gear Element]</font>

Fire – Reduces the Enemy's ATK.
Frost – Slows the Enemy.
Electric – Paralyzes the Enemy.
Poison – Reduces the Enemy's DEF.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Gear Trait]</font>
Elemental Gear will gain the Element's Trait. Bow's Trait is an activation effect and other Gear's Trait enhances the Bow's same Element Trait.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Enhancing]</font>
You can use the Enhance Scroll to Enhance Gear. The main Element will increase upon success. From +4 Enhancing and on your Enhancing may fail and may decrease the Enhancing. If you use Protection Stone when enhancing the Enhancing probability will increase.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Promotion]</font>
Gear over +12 can promote the Gear's Tier. Promoted Gear's Enhancing will reset.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Craft]</font>
You can craft Gear. You'll need Designs to craft them. The Quality of the Gear will be chosen upon crafting. Better quality will give the Gear higher Stats. Upon a Great Success you'll obtain an Elemental Gear.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Purchase]</font>
You can use Steel to purchase Gear Designs, Enhance Scrolls, and Protection Stones. You can purchase the Gear's Designs if you've crafted it once before.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Dismantle]</font>
You can Dismantle Archer's item and obtain Steel. You can Dismantle Gear, Designs, Enhance Scroll, and Protection Stone.
HELP_MSG_ASTROLOTY:
<font color='#00ff00'>[Astrology]</font>
 By borrowing the mysterious power of the stars, you can summon various goods and items using the various coins and goods you have.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Number of summons]</font>
 Each astrology menu can be summoned 15 times per day. You can use rubies twice a day to recharge the number of summons for each astrology menu.
HELP_MSG_CASTLE:
<font color='#00ff00'>[Level Up]</font>
Leveling up the Castle will increase the Castle‘s HP and Archer‘s ATK.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Increase Slots]</font>
When you reach a certain level, a Slot to place a Hero will be added.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Increase Archers]</font>
When you reach a certain level, Archers on the Castle Wall will increase.

<font color='#00ff00'>[DEF engraving]</font>
The imprint of the ancients is engraved on the castle, giving the castle DEF. Engraving requires Ancient Coins. Each time you make an engraving, EXP increases, and when you gain 2000 experience, the engraving level increases. You can use rubies to make advanced engraving. Advanced engraving earns at least 200 experience, and the probability of obtaining high experience is higher than normal engraving.
HELP_MSG_CONQUEST:
<font color='#00ff00'>[continents and kingdoms]</font>
We can conquer the kingdoms of other continents that have succumbed to monsters and make them ours. There are several kingdoms on a continent, and a kingdom has 10 fortresses and 1 capital.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Fortress]</font>
When you conquer a fortress, rewards are accumulated at regular intervals. There are fortresses that either produce Gold or Soul Stones. You can use iron to level up your fortress. As the fortress level rises, the production increases. As the level of the fortress increases, the maximum accumulation amount (MAX) increases.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Capital]</font>
You can try to conquer the capital after capturing all 10 fortresses in the kingdom. When you conquer the capital, Ascension Stones and Gold will accumulate at regular intervals. In the capital, you can appoint a hero as the Lord. A bonus multiplier is applied to the capital's rewards based on the hero's grade. You can move directly to the location of each kingdom by touching the button at the bottom of the Conquest map.
HELP_MSG_FIELD:
<font color='#00ff00'>[Auto-Battle]</font>
Continue gathering various rewards even after turning off the game. You must tap the Claim Button to obtain EXP, Gold, and Soulstones. You can obtain other items by tapping on the Treasure Chest.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Start Battle]</font>
Starts the new Stage. You go to the next Stage upon victory. You'll always obtain Kingdom EXP, Gold, and Soulstones. You'll also be able to select a Hero's Seal or Gear Seal.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Repeat-Battle]</font>
You can battle again in a cleared Stage. You'll be able to obtain Gold, Soulstones, and items available from Auto-Battle.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Hero Skill]</font>
Heroes can use their skills during a battle. You can activate the Support Hero's Skill by tapping on the button and Warrior Heroes' Skill will trigger automatically periodically.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Auto-Progress]</font>
After entering a Battle, you can automatically progress through the Stage. You'll go to the next Stage upon winning the Normal Battle and repeatedly battle during the Repeat-Battle.
HELP_MSG_FORGE:
<font color='#00ff00'>[Combine]</font>
You can combine Hero Gear. You can combine 3 pieces of Gear of the same Tier to obtain 1 high Tier Gear. You'll need Gold to Combine.
HELP_MSG_FORMATION:
<font color='#00ff00'>[Castle Slot]</font>
Slot located above the Castle. You can place Support Heroes on it.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Field Slot]</font>
Slot located in the Field in front of the Castle. You can place Warrior Heroes on it.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Hero List]</font>
List of deployable Heroes. You can use the Top Tab Buttons to navigate between Support and Warrior Heroes. To remove a Hero from the formation, tap on the placed Hero and tap again when the remove mark is shown on their portrait.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Details]</font>
You can view the Hero's Information.
HELP_MSG_HERO:
<font color='#00ff00'>[Hero Type]</font>
Support Heroes are in charge of Ranged Attacks, Buffs or Summoning on top of the Castle Wall, and Warrior Heroes will fight in the Field against the Monsters. Support Type Heroes can only be placed on the Castle Slots and Warrior Type Heroes can only be placed on the Field Slots.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Level Up]</font>
Leveling up will increase a Hero's HP, ATK, and DEF. You'll need Gold and Soulstones for leveling up.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Ascend]</font>
Ascending will activate a new Skill or increase a Skill's level and increase the Hero's Stats greatly. You'll need Hero Shards and Ascension Stones for Upgrading.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Hero Gear]</font>
You can equip Gear on Heroes. Hero Gear has different properties depending on its type.

Weapon – ATK, ACCURACY, CRIT DMG Reduce
Helmet – HP, CRIT Resist, Def Penetration
Armor – CRIT, CRIT DMG, DEF
Boots – DODGE, Movement Speed, Attack Speed

<font color='#00ff00'>[Set Gear Effect]</font>
If you equip 2 of the same Tier, an Gear Set Effect will be activated.

2 Equipped – CRIT DMG increases by %
3 Equipped – DEF Penetration increases by %
4 Equipped – ATK increases by %

<font color='#00ff00'>[Hero Skill]</font>
 Active Skill(Supporter) - You can cast it by touching skill button in battle.
 Active Skill(Warrior) - It is automatically cast when the activation condition is satisfied at regular intervals.
 Passive Skill - The effect of the skill is continuously maintained.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Features by skill type]</font>
 Recovery Skill - Not affected by each Hero Gear effect and Gear Set effect.
 Summoning Skills - Gear effects are applied according to the acquired passive skills. It is not affected by Gear set effects.
 Recovery Skill, Summoning Skills - Unaffected by buffs granted during battle.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Rune]</font>
 A Rune tree will be revealed as the Hero's Grade. To enhance each rune, you must Enhance the previous connected rune. Runes can be Enhancing and refine. When a rune is enhanced, the min~max value of the power of the rune increases. You also can refine a rune to determine the value within the range of min-max. Rune Pieces and Magic Dust needed to enhance and refine runes can be obtained from the Sanctuary.
HELP_MSG_HEROLIST:
<font color='#00ff00'>[All]</font>
In this Menu you can view all owned Support and Warrior Heroes.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Support]</font>
In this Menu you can view all owned Support Heroes. Support Heroes can only be placed in Castle Slots.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Warrior]</font>
In this Menu you can view all owned Warrior Heroes. Warrior Heroes can only be placed in the Field Slots.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Index]</font>
In this Menu you can view all Hero Information. If you've collected all Shards for a Hero, you can summon them in the Index.
HELP_MSG_MARKET:
<font color='#00ff00'>[Normal Shop]</font>
You can purchase items using Gold and Rubies.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Portal Shop]</font>
You can purchase items using Portal Coins. You can obtain Portal Coins by winning Portal Battles.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Ruins Shop]</font>
You can purchase items using Ruins Coins. You can obtain Ruins Coins by winning Ruins Battles.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Expedition Shop]</font>
You can purchase items using Expedition Coins. You can obtain Expedition Coins by winning Expedition Battles.
HELP_MSG_PORTAL:
<font color='#00ff00'>[Legion Info]</font>
Intercept the enemy Legions coming through the Portal. A total of 4 Legions will alternatively invade daily. Each Legion has special Buffs making them stronger than Common Monsters.

Legion of Terror – Legion takes less damage from friendly Archers.
Legion of Hatred – Legion takes less damage from friendly Support Heroes.
Legion of Magic – Legion deals more damage to the Castle.
Legion of Steel – Legion won't be affected by Crowd Control.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Legion Reward]</font>
You'll be able to obtain different rewards from each Legion.

Legion of Terror – Hero Seals
Legion of Hatred – Weapon Enhance Scrolls
Legion of Magic – Gear Seals
Legion of Steel – Armor Enhance Scrolls
HELP_MSG_RAID:
<font color='#00ff00'>[Boss Information]</font>
You can eliminate the Boss found outside the Kingdom and obtain items for growth. There are 2 Bosses currently, and the Bosses will change daily.

Dragon of the Abyss – Periodically performs a strong Breath.
Wolf of Full Moon – Periodically slams the ground and deals damage.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Victory Reward Chest]</font>
Upon Victory, you'll receive Expedition Coins and you can also select 1 of 5 Chests to obtain a Reward. The first chest is free and from then on you'll need Rubies to open them.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Boss Reward]</font>
Different rewards are given for each Boss.

Dragon of the Abyss – Shining Weapon Enhance Scrolls, Weapon Protection Stones, and Shining Weapon Protection Stones
Wolf of Full Moon – Shining Armor Enhance Scrolls, Armor Protection Stones, Shining Armor Protection Stones
HELP_MSG_RUIN:
<font color='#00ff00'>[Ruins Information]</font>
You can protect the Sacred Artifact for a certain period of time to obtain various rewards. If you successfully defend the Ruins 3, 6, 9, 12, and 15 times, you'll receive additional Rubies. Protect Ruins will reset daily and the strength of monsters is of also determined at that time.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Castle HP]</font>
Castle's HP will be saved after each Ruins Battle. You cannot continue to the next battle if your HP reaches 0. You can recover the Castle's HP by tapping on the + button. Free once a day.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Purchase Buff]</font>
You can purchase Buffs which will strengthen allies during the Ruins Battle or Debuffs which will weaken enemies. You'll receive 1 of 3 Buffs every purchase at random. The Buff only lasts for 1 battle.
HELP_MSG_SANCTUARY:
<font color='#00ff00'>[Rune Summon]</font>
You can use Rune Seals to summon runes. When you summon them, you will receive Rune Pieces that can enhance the runes of each hero. You will gain more EXP every time you summon Runes.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Rune Summoning Level]</font>
New Rune Summoning Step will be unlocked based on the EXP you gain through summoning runes. You can obtain higher grade runes as you reach a higher Rune Summoning Step. Even if you gain the maximum amount of EXP, the summoning Step cannot be unlocked if you do not reach a certain stage. You will need more Rune Seals for summoning as you reach a higher summoning Step.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Rune Dismantle]</font>
You can obtain Magic Dust by dismantling rune pieces. Magic Dust is used to refine runes.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Rune Summoning Probability]</font>
Lowest Grade of each summoning level: 70%
Middle Grade of each summoning level: 22%
Top Grade of each summoning level: 8%
HELP_MSG_SHOP:
<font color='#00ff00'>[Package]</font>
This item is made up of various items and currency. There's a limit to how much you can purchase in a certain period of time.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Monthly Package]</font>
You'll instantly obtain some Rubies, then for the next 30 days you'll receive a fixed amount of Rubies daily.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Rubies]</font>
You can obtain Rubies, a high quality currency, from this item.

<font color='#00ff00'>[Upgrade]</font>
This item will upgrade certain content in game. The upgrade effect will be permanently applied.

SUMMONTICKET_DESC_1_1: This ticket can be used to get a free Normal Hero Summon in the Fountain.
SUMMONTICKET_DESC_1_2: This ticket can be used to get a free Advanced Hero Summon in the Fountain.
SUMMONTICKET_DESC_1_3: This ticket can be used to get a free Greater Hero Summon in the Fountain.
SUMMONTICKET_DESC_1_4: This ticket can be used to get a free Ultra Hero Summon in the Fountain.
SUMMONTICKET_DESC_2_1: This ticket can be used to get a free Normal Hero Gear Summon in the Fountain.
SUMMONTICKET_DESC_2_2: This ticket can be used to get a free Advanced Hero Gear Summon in the Fountain.
SUMMONTICKET_DESC_2_3: This ticket can be used to get a free Greater Hero Gear Summon in the Fountain.
SUMMONTICKET_DESC_2_4: This ticket can be used to get a free Ultra Hero Gear Summon in the Fountain.
TOOLTIP_ENEMY_RESIST_DESC_1: Trigger Rate at which Crowd Control occurs on monsters due to an ally's attack is reduced.
TOOLTIP_ENEMY_RESIST_DESC_2: Duration of Crowd Control triggered by an ally's attack is reduced.
TOOLTIP_ENEMY_RESIST_DESC_3: Effect of Crowd Control triggered by an ally's attack is reduced.
TOOLTIP_ENEMY_RESIST_DESC_4: Freezes monsters to reduce their SPEED.
TOOLTIP_HEROPIECE_DESC: This Shard is for summoning or ascending {0}.
TUTORIAL_10_1: Champion! The Giant Bosses have woken up.
TUTORIAL_10_2: It's highly risky, but it will be well worth the risk. We can reap big rewards for eliminating the Boss.
TUTORIAL_10_3: Let's go see what it is! The Expedition Team is waiting at the base.
TUTORIAL_10_4: This time 2 Bosses woke up. Different Bosses will appear daily.
TUTORIAL_10_5: Each of the Giant Bosses possess unique Skills so be sure to memorize them.
TUTORIAL_10_6: Tap on the Skill Icon to check the Boss Trait.
TUTORIAL_10_7: There are total of 3 Skills, so remember them and plan your strategy. I wish you luck!
TUTORIAL_11_1: Champion, the General Store has opened.
TUTORIAL_11_2: Let's go to the General Store
TUTORIAL_11_3: Here you can purchase items you need.
TUTORIAL_11_4: The Menu on the left has various General Stores!
TUTORIAL_11_5: You'll be able to purchase Rare items with Coins you've obtained from the battles from this point on.
TUTORIAL_11_6: Go have a look! I'll be waiting in the Battlefield.
TUTORIAL_1_1: You've finally arrived, Champion! The Kingdom is in dire need of your help.
TUTORIAL_1_10: Let's go to the battlefield right away.
TUTORIAL_1_11: While you were away, the battles against the monsters continued.
TUTORIAL_1_12: However, Auto-Battle only progresses in the selected Stage.
TUTORIAL_1_13: To progress to the next Stage, you must eliminate the Boss.
TUTORIAL_1_14: Let's go eliminate the first Stage Boss!
TUTORIAL_1_15: Champion, the time is at hand! Use my Skill!
TUTORIAL_1_16: I fire 5 Magic Arrows to the location you desire. Tap on the desired location.
TUTORIAL_1_17: Good job! To come out victorious, you must choose wisely when and where to use a Skill.
TUTORIAL_1_18: Alright, lead us in battle to annihilate the enemies!
TUTORIAL_1_19: We've managed to win, but it was a difficult battle.
TUTORIAL_1_2: First summon me from the Hero Menu.
TUTORIAL_1_21: A new Hero is ready. We should recruit one more Hero.
TUTORIAL_1_22: Greetings Champion! My name is Logan.
TUTORIAL_1_23: If you place me, I'll be able to summon soldiers during the battle.
TUTORIAL_1_24: Oh, there's no empty Hero slot!
TUTORIAL_1_25: Let's go to the Castle Menu. I can help you with that.
TUTORIAL_1_26: Increase the Castle Level to Lv.20. I'll provide you with some Gold.
TUTORIAL_1_27: Look! A new Support Hero Slot has opened.
TUTORIAL_1_28: Now you can place me in the Formation Menu.
TUTORIAL_1_3: Great! Now place me in the formation.
TUTORIAL_1_31: Now that I'm part of the team, the battle will be much easier!
TUTORIAL_1_32: What an exhilarating victory! This is all possible because you were here with us.
TUTORIAL_1_33: Oh, there're some Rewards accumulated from the Auto-Hunt.
TUTORIAL_1_34: Tap the Claim button to obtain EXP, Gold and Soulstones.
TUTORIAL_1_35: Now tap on the Loot Chest and obtain the Item.
TUTORIAL_1_36: Good job! Now level up Ellie and me with the obtained rewards.
TUTORIAL_1_38: Great! Now level me up this time.
TUTORIAL_1_39: Thank you very much, Champion! I won't let you down.
TUTORIAL_1_40: You've finally got the hang of the basics.
TUTORIAL_1_41: Let's go test how strong you've become!
TUTORIAL_1_43: More battles will happen as you progress through the stages.
TUTORIAL_1_44: You'll face many different enemies from Portal, King's Ruins or Expedition... !
TUTORIAL_1_45: I know you'll be there to lead us to victory in every battle.
TUTORIAL_1_46: We're in your hands from now!
TUTORIAL_1_5: Tap on the slot on top of the Castle Wall.
TUTORIAL_1_6: Perfect! Now I can participate in the battle.
TUTORIAL_1_7: Hmm, but it seems like the Castle is very badly damaged. We'll need to repair it.
TUTORIAL_1_8: I'll give you a sufficient amount of Gold, so try leveling up the Castle to Lv.10.
TUTORIAL_1_9: Great! Increasing the Castle Level will also increase the Hero Slots and number of Archers. So don't forget to continuously level it up.
TUTORIAL_6_1: Champion, the Archers can now equip Gear!
TUTORIAL_6_10: I'll give you some Weapon Enhance Scrolls, so enhance them 4 times.
TUTORIAL_6_11: Great! After the +4 Enhancement, Enhance failure will result in a decrease in Enhance level. So be careful.
TUTORIAL_6_12: This time I'll tell you about Promotion, Purchase, and Dismantle feature of Archer Gear.
TUTORIAL_6_13: Here you can increase the Tier of the +{0} Gear.
TUTORIAL_6_14: Here you can purchase Designs, Enhance Scrolls and Protection Stones.
TUTORIAL_6_15: Here you can obtain Steel by Dismantling Gear or other miscellaneous Items.
TUTORIAL_6_16: Now Equip the strong Bow on the Archer!
TUTORIAL_6_19: Amazing! Equip the rest of the Gear to make the Archers stronger.
TUTORIAL_6_2: Let's go to the Archer Menu.
TUTORIAL_6_20: You can obtain Gear Designs as rewards from winning the battle or from Auto-Hunt.
TUTORIAL_6_23: Now shall we go to the Battlefield to see how the Archers are doing?
TUTORIAL_6_25: This time I'll tell you about the Purchase Menu. Tap on the Purchase button.
TUTORIAL_6_26: Lastly I'll tell you about the Dismantle Menu! Tap on the Dismantle button.
TUTORIAL_6_28: Better Quality Gear is stronger. Elemental Gear gains special effects.
TUTORIAL_6_29: I'll tell you how you can increase the Tier of Gear with high Enhancement.
TUTORIAL_6_3: I brought the Design for you to craft for the first time.
TUTORIAL_6_5: When crafting Gear, its quality and element will be randomly chosen.
TUTORIAL_6_7: Good! Now let's enhance the Gear.
TUTORIAL_6_9: Weapon and Armor need their own Enhance Scroll to be enhanced.
TUTORIAL_7_1: Champion! I'll tell you a way to become stronger.
TUTORIAL_7_10: Now I'll tell you about other Menus from the Fountain.
TUTORIAL_7_11: Tap the Purchase Hero Menu button.
TUTORIAL_7_12: Here you can use Ancient Coins to purchase Hero Shards of your choice.
TUTORIAL_7_13: Lastly, let's take a look at Dismantle.
TUTORIAL_7_14: Here you can dismantle Hero Shards to obtain Ancient Coins.
TUTORIAL_7_15: Alright, now let's equip the summoned Hero Gear.
TUTORIAL_7_16: Oh, the Blacksmith started working again. Why don't we take a look before equipping the Hero Gear?
TUTORIAL_7_17: You can combine the same type of Hero Gear to create better Hero Gear.
TUTORIAL_7_18: Higher Tier Gear has better Stats and Set Effects.
TUTORIAL_7_19: I bet the Heroes are waiting for new Hero Gear. Let's go to the Hero Menu.
TUTORIAL_7_20: Tap on the Gear Tab to see which Hero Gear you own.
TUTORIAL_7_22: Champion! Please collect more Shards and Hero Gear from the Fountain to make us stronger!
TUTORIAL_7_3: I'll tell you about the Hero Summon.
TUTORIAL_7_4: I'll give you a Hero‘s Seal to use in the Normal Summon.
TUTORIAL_7_5: You've summoned me again! When you summon already owned Heroes, you'll obtain Shards depending on the Hero's Tier.
TUTORIAL_7_6: If you don't have enough Hero‘s Seals, you can use Rubies to summon them.
TUTORIAL_7_8: I'll give you an Gear Seal to use in for a Normal Summon.
TUTORIAL_7_9: Good job! Gear Summon level changes as the stages progress.
TUTORIAL_8_1: Champion! News has arrived that the Portal to the Demonic World has opened.
TUTORIAL_8_2: Let's quickly go to the Portal.
TUTORIAL_8_3: There are 4 types of Legions in the Demonic World.
TUTORIAL_8_4: Each Legion possesses its own unique Traits, so you must use the right strategy for each one.
TUTORIAL_8_5: Tap on the Legion Icon to check its Legion Trait.
TUTORIAL_8_6: Great! Take your time to prepare for the battle. We're with you Champion!
TUTORIAL_9_1: Champion! The Ruins where the Ancient Kings are sleeping is in danger!
TUTORIAL_9_10: Now go eliminate the enemies who are disturbing the Ancient Kings' rest!
TUTORIAL_9_2: Let's go to the King's Ruins
TUTORIAL_9_3: The King's Ruins is made up of 15 different ones.
TUTORIAL_9_4: You'll receive a bonus for successfully protecting each Ruins for a fixed duration.
TUTORIAL_9_5: The Castle's HP doesn't automatically recover after battling in the King's Ruins.
TUTORIAL_9_6: Instead, you can tap the + button on the bottom left to recover the Castle HP.
TUTORIAL_9_7: If you think a battle is going to be hard, tap on the Purchase Buff Button.
TUTORIAL_9_8: You'll be able to obtain a random Buff which will be a lot of help during the battle.
TUTORIAL_9_9: However, the Buff will disappear after winning a Battle.
